title: Joe Clark on Toronto Subway typography
content:
Just read this paper which was support material for Joe Clark’s presentation at AtypI a few days ago. A worthy read.

[http://joeclark.org/appearances/atypi/2007/TTC/inscribed/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071201030948/http:/joeclark.org/appearances/atypi/2007/TTC/inscribed/ "http://joeclark.org/appearances/atypi/2007/TTC/inscribed/")

Digg it here: [http://www.digg.com/design/Type\_in\_the\_Toronto\_Subway](http://web.archive.org/web/20071201030948/http:/www.digg.com/design/Type_in_the_Toronto_Subway "http://www.digg.com/design/Type\_in\_the\_Toronto\_Subway")
author: Jared Benson

comments.content: Thanks for posting this Jared — I’ve been trying to find documentation on the spacing project for ages. Wish i could have been there for the talk.
Amazingly thorough. We need more citizens like Joe as passionate about changing things for the better as he.
